name: Work Bathroom Simulator
description:
During the the 2020 pandemic, many people were pulled away from their office spaces. For too long a time,  no one had small talk over the water cooler, no one to watched you eat your lunch over your keyboard, and no one hovered over your shoulder while you pretended to work...

A great depression hit. That is, until employers began to realize the future: virtual work spaces. Now productivity can be accomplished at all hours of the day! After all, what is work-life balance without the WORK part?

Return to the office and relive the thrilling adventure of passive-aggression in Work Bathroom Simulator™!
